title: Windows 95 on Linux on a Mac - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Windows 95 on Linux on a Mac
Windows 95 on Linux on a Mac - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Windows 95 on Linux on a Mac. Nothing can go wrong! Join Krazy Ken as he tinkers with Microsoft Windows 95 in an Electron emulator app on Zorin OS Linux on a Mac mini.  Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    App made by Felix. Follow him on Twitter: @felixrieseberg  Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #66 - Windows 95 on Linux on a Mac  Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
